history.content:
I really don't recommend 61C+70 together - its possible but its miserable and you don't get as much out of the course. 

While the two are a nice combo of pset class + project class, all of the deadlines overlap - the midterms are the same day or the day after, and then both assignments are due the next day after. 

last semester, I felt constantly torn between each class's requirements each day and week - every day was "how can I get all the assignments done" and not "how can I actually understand all the concepts given toward both classes". 

I definitely felt my grade in each course was impacted because of taking them together. 

I am in Data100 right now, and i feel the workload is lighter but I have more experience than most in the course - I accidentally took it after 61a, b, c a bunch of stat classes, and teaching a course for two years, so its lighter, but I still probably wouldn't have added it on to the workload. 

This can't stop you from taking them together, if you feel that you won't struggle too much with the material, but I felt it was very miserable trying to understand the materiel (which I found difficult in both 61c and 70) and complete all the assignments, and this is coming from someone who is used to taking a heavy tech workload

Feel free to ask more questions about this 

and other feel free to give your own opinion, as my experiences are not universal

Also considering taking a breadth. Is this schedule doable?

Also, which one should I phase 2?

Thanks!
history.subject: 61C + 70 + Data 100
